actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Isle Royale National Park in Michigan as wilderness, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Designate specified lands in the Isle Royale National Park in Michigan as wilderness. Designates the Gull Islands included in the Isle Royale National Park by this Act as wilderness.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Isle Royale National Park in Michigan as wilderness, and for other purposes.
